metadata.synopsis: One liner of a haunted painting in the atelier of Jannath Estate  that will say some insult with the voice of Kerri Evenfield, the ghost that is haunting the whole mansion.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe LOW_OskarsBeloved_BringOskarHomego to CTY_Main_A --270; 37; -45Interact with portrait in that position.

0.speaker: GROUP_LOW_OskarsBeloved_Kerri
0.text: I'll smear your flesh on this canvas.
